summary: A new dungeon built with RonnieMagnum´s Akaviri Dungeon tileset.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]YduOy-lRo7s[/youtube] 

-No DLC required.
 -This mod is NOT compatible with RonnieMagnus`original AkaviriDungeonTestENG.esp file from his resource. You should always use EITHER of them- never activate both at the same time.

*********************************************************************************************************
Features
*********************************************************************************************************
  This is a 6-level dungeon crawl where you will fight your way through akaviri dungeons, mines and caverns, plus two small landmasses you will be visiting after completing some of these levels. You will fight a bunch of akaviri bandits called the Ghuang-ho, plus some new creatures. Be prepared to search for keys, I added a spoiler.txt file in this mod telling where are they in case you are having problems in finding it.  In the last level there will be a treasure, a chest with playable versions from the armors and robes weared by the Ghuang Ho (The fire hair was designed for female characters only) and a magic portal back to Skyrim, so you don´t have to go all the way back.

*********************************************************************************************************
Known bugs and issues
*********************************************************************************************************
 
You should report any bug or glitch you find.

*********************************************************************************************************
Installation
*********************************************************************************************************

 Just extract TempleofHighness.esp and TempleofHighness.bsa to your Skyrim "Data" Folder. Add a check to TempleofHighness.esp in your game start menu to activate the mod... and play!

*********************************************************************************************************
Uninstallation
*********************************************************************************************************
 Just delete TempleofHighness.esp and TempleofHighness.bsa from your PC and... Voilá! The Whole mod is gone!

*********************************************************************************************************
Credits
*********************************************************************************************************

 I have used assets from the following authors in this mod:

_ RONNIEMAGNUM
_ WALKINGMESSOFCOMPLEXES
_ THE-FUNKTASM
_ APEPIOFDUAT

_ NICKORASU

files.name: 1.1 Update
files.changelogHtml:
- Fixed glitch that marked as "stolen" the treasure.
- Fixed some small cracks and floating rocks.
- Added torches to some barrels.

files.name: Patch for no portal bug
files.changelogHtml:
- Fixed glitch that marked as "stolen" the treasure.
- Fixed some small cracks and floating rocks.
- Added torches to some barrels.

files.name: Update and patch.
files.changelogHtml:
-Changed bandits names
-Fixed torch barrels
-Fixed some misplaced objects
-Fixed at once the bug which prevented the portal to show up at the map marker

files.name: 1.3 Update
files.changelogHtml:
- Fixed bug that made companions go astray in the 1st level.
- Added more clutter to some areas
- Improved lightning in some spots and put a barrel with some torches at the dungeon´s entrance. You will find more inside.
